servinfo.title: Front Suspension Frame, Stabilizer Bar and/or Bushings Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Front Suspension Frame, Stabilizer Bar and/or Bushings Components

s1.ptxt: Hoist vehicle and remove wheels (right & left).
Remove engine under cover.
Remove suspension control arm referring to Suspension Control Arm Removal and Installation .
Remove right side and left side front drive shaft assembly referring to Front Drive Shaft Assembly Removal and Installation:Front .
Remove stabilizer joints (1). When loosening joint nut, hold stud with hexagon wrench.
Disconnect front fender lining clip (1) (if equipped with head light auto leveling system).
Disconnect front height sensor connector (1) (if equipped with head light auto leveling system) and then detach clip (2).
Disconnect steering lower shaft from pinion shaft referring to P/S Gear Case Assembly Removal and Installation .
Detach low pressure return hose (2) from low pressure return pipe (3) and then disconnect pipe bracket (1).
Remove gear box union bolt (1).
Remove front propeller shaft referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
Fix radiator (2) to body with rope (1) to avoid the radiator (2) fall off when front suspension frame lowered.
Support engine assemble as follows.

item.ptxt: Using engine supporting device, support engine according to Engine Supporting Points .

attention2.ptxt: Be sure to support engine by using engine front hunger only. Failure to follow this instruction could result in damage to engine front and rear hungers.

s2.ptxt: Remove hood referring to Hood Removal and Installation .
Support engine assemble by using chain hoist.

s1.ptxt: Support suspension frame at the specified positions (1) indicated in figure.

attention1.ptxt: When removing suspension frame, be sure to apply some supporting equipment under it at well-balanced position as shown in the figure section so as to prevent from its drop.

s1.ptxt: Remove engine front body side mounting nuts (1).
Remove suspension frame mounting bolts (2), and then lower suspension frame (3) with stabilizer bar, P/S gear box assembly and front differential assembly.
Remove P/S gear box assembly (1) and front differential assembly (2) referring to P/S Gear Case Assembly Removal and Installation and Front Differential Dismounting and Remounting:Front .
Remove stabilizer bar (1) and bushing (2) from suspension frame (3).
When installing stabilizer, loosely assemble all components while insuring that stabilizer is centered, side-to-side.
Install stabilizer bar (1), stabilizer bushing (2) and stabilizer mounting bracket (3) to suspension frame.

attention3.ptxt: Install the stabilizer bar whose mark (5) is to front.

s1.ptxt: Tighten stabilizer bar mounting bracket bolts (4) to specified torque.
Install P/S gear box assembly (1) and front differential assembly (2) referring to P/S Gear Case Assembly Removal and Installation and Front Differential Dismounting and Remounting:Front .
Install suspension frame.

attention1.ptxt: When installing suspension frame, be sure to apply some supporting equipment under it at well-balanced position as shown in the figure section so as to prevent from its drop.

attention2.ptxt: Lug (2) in suspension frame (1) must be mated to the corresponding hole in body. And also engine front body side mounting bolts (3) and engine mount lug (4) must be mated to the corresponding holes in suspension frame.

s1.ptxt: Tighten suspension frame mounting bolts (1) and engine front body side mounting nuts (2) to specified torque.

attention2.ptxt: If reuse suspension frame mounting bolt, apply engine oil to thread, bearing and trunk surface.

torqueitem.t-part: Engine front body side mounting nut

s1.ptxt: Remove chain hoist from engine and the rope (1) from the radiator (2).
Install hood referring to Hood Removal and Installation .
Install front propeller shaft referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
Tighten pipe bracket (1) bolts to specified torque and then insert low pressure return hose (2) to low pressure return pipe (3).
Tighten union gear box bolt (1) to specified torque.
Connect steering lower shaft from pinion shaft Steering referring to P/S Gear Case Assembly Removal and Installation .
Connect front height sensor connector (1) (if equipped with head light auto leveling system) and then detach clip (2).
Connect front fender lining clip (1) (if equipped with head light auto leveling system).
Install stabilizer joints (1), and tighten nuts to specified torque. When tightening, hold stud with hexagon wrench.
Install right side and left side front drive shaft assembly referring to Front Drive Shaft Assembly Removal and Installation:Front .
Install suspension control arm referring to Suspension Control Arm Removal and Installation .
Install engine under cover.
Install wheels (right & left) and lower hoist.
After installation, be sure to fill specified power steering fluid and bleed air referring to P/S System Air Bleeding Procedure .
Adjust headlight auto leveling system, refer to Initialization of Auto Leveling Headlight System .
